BasicInfo.short: Synata, an enterprise cloud search engine, enables users to find files, emails, contacts and other information across software used at work.

Products.name: Synata
Products.description: Quickly find files, emails, contacts, calendar appointments, chats, and more regardless of where they’re stored.

news.title: Synata Brings Simplicity to the Cloud with New Enterprise Cloud Search Solution

Products.name: Synata Chrome Extension
Products.description: Instantly search across your enterprise applications from your Chrome browser.

news.title: We’re Starting Out the Year with a Chrome Extension and a Few Other Goodies
